name: Borders Perrin Norrander
tagline: We Help Brands Punch Way Above Their Weight
description:
We’re Borders Perrin Norrander, a full-service, creatively-driven agency headquartered in Portland, Oregon. 
From day one, we’ve been on a mission: To do the kind of courageous work that gets noticed, gets results and ultimately makes brands legendary. 
We believe in partnering with clients who share our conviction for doing smart, courageous work – work that separates them from the competition and becomes an indelible part of their brand.
